title: What is the counterplay to Leona?
body:
I like to play Sona a lot, and this is starting to get on my nerves.

Against any other initiation support (thresh, blitz, braum, etc) there's a way for me to avoid their engage and get an advantage if I'm careful.

But against Leona, I have to huddle under my tower and write my ADC off as a lost cause. 

At level 1, Leona is tanky enough that other level 1s won't be able to kill her.
Once she hits level 2, getting anywhere within 1000 units of her means you will be stunned for 3 seconds and lose a minimum of 70% of your health (if you flashed; if you didn't you died before you could walk two steps away from her and her adc).
Her passive means she never loses a trade. Her W means she can never be ganked and can never be poked or focused down. She can dive -before- level 6 and get away with it the majority of the time.
Once she hits 6, her death-bubble extends to 1500+ units thanks to her ult, which is on a shorter base cooldown than almost any other ultimate ability in the game.
Oh, and if you want to ward the bush she's hiding in, good luck, since she'll just auto-Q-auto it for free gold (assuming she doesn't just engage on you for another kill, for some reason).

What the hell am I supposed to do against Leona?
